text:
Anthony Mackie Awarded Best Hero

Anthony Mackie gives an acceptance speech after winning the award for Best Hero at the MTV Movie & TV Awards 2021 for his role in "The Falcon and the Winter Soldier."
title: MTV Movie & TV Awards 2022
